game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has lost all meaning, players take on the role of a Timekeeper tasked with restoring the fabric of reality. The game takes place across multiple eras, each with its own unique challenges and storylines.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate, post-apocalyptic future where humanity teeters on the brink of collapse. Players are introduced to the concept of time dilation and the role they must play in fixing the timeline.
game.ending: As players progress through the eras, they uncover a deeper conspiracy behind the distortion of time. Ultimately, they must face their own mortality and make a choice that will determine the fate of humanity. Will they restore the original timeline or forge a new path?
